info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: The tech stuff might take a bit to figure out.
sentense.ko: 신기술을 배우는 데는 시간이 좀 걸리겠죠

sentense.en: I had to call my 9-year-old grandson just to find out what a USB connector was.
sentense.ko: 9살 먹은 제 손자한테 전화해서 USB가 뭔지 물어야 했거든요

sentense.en: But I'll get there. Eager to learn.
sentense.ko: 하지만 배울 수 있어요 배우고 싶어요
